parameter.name: bgcolor0
parameter.help: If given, sets the bgcolor for even numbered rows. If not given, the bgcolor for these rows is taken from the style's bgcolor.

parameter.name: bgcolor1
parameter.help: If given, sets the bgcolor for odd numbered rows. If not given, the bgcolor for these rows is taken from the style's bgcolor.

parameter.name: columns
parameter.help: An array holding the basegridcolumns used by this grid

parameter.name: contentdatapath
parameter.help: The datapath to use for the contents of the grid. By default, this is set to "*", meaning all of the nodes underneath the datacontext of the grid.

parameter.name: hilite
parameter.help: The view which is currently hilited.

parameter.name: multiselect
parameter.help: If true, the list will allow for multiple selection, and the getSelection method will always return a list. If false, only single selection is allowed.

parameter.name: rowheight
parameter.help: Optional height for the rows contained by the grid. If no value is given for this attribute, it will be set to the calculated height of rows.

parameter.name: selectable
parameter.help: If false, the rows are not clickable and the grid does not support selection.

parameter.name: showhlines
parameter.help: If true, lines will be drawn (in component's style's bordercolor) vertically at each at each column division. This attribute can be set after instantiation.

parameter.name: shownitems
parameter.help: Sets the height of the grid to show a maximum of 'n' items.

parameter.name: showvlines
parameter.help: If true, lines will be drawn (in component's style's bordercolor) horizontally at each at each row division. This attribute cannot be set after instantiation.

parameter.name: sizetoheader
parameter.help: A boolean. If true, the grid will keep its width set to the size of the header. This is automatically set to true for grids that do not have a set width. This is initially set to 0, which means that it is not true, but if it is explicitly set to false, the automatic behavior will be disabled for grids with no set width.
